titleStmt.title: To all persons of quality, ladies, gentlemen, tradesmen, and all others to whom these epistolary lines may come, I.P. wisheth all health and happiness, length of days, with increase of riches.
titleStmt.author: Partridge, John, 1644-1715.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Corpus Christi College (University of Oxford). Library.
